attributes.action: Reduce footballers pay so that the NHS earn more then them
attributes.additional_details: This will help stop strikes with the NHS. Soon if the NHS don't get paid anymore it is pretty obvious that there are going to be no health workers and more footballers because of their pay! You think that footballers who DONT SAVE PEOPLE'S LIVES deserve more than these people who SAVE PEOPLE'S LIVES
attributes.background:
I and maybe others want footballers pay reduced and for the NHS to earn MORE than the people who do hardly anything.

You think that footballers who DONT SAVE PEOPLE'S LIVES deserve more than these people who SAVE PEOPLE'S LIVES it's PRETTY OBVIOUS!

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about pay for footballers are a matter for individual football clubs, not the UK Government or Parliament.
